textgoal: This function uses recursion to count down to 0
board: [u'15', u'function countDown(n) { return n == 10 ? n : countDown(n-1); }']

textgoal: Define a function that counts down to 1
board: [u'5', u'function countDown(n) { return n == _ ? n : countDown(_ - 1); }', u'n']

textgoal: We can use recursion to count up too.
board: [u'function countUpTo(x, n) { return x == _ ? x : countUpTo(x + 1, n); }']
[u'function countUpTo(x, n) { return x == _ ? x : countUpTo(_, _); }', u'8', u'5']
